title: Mobile App Developer
jobDescription:
• As an Android Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining Android applications.
  • You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to create high-quality, user-friendly mobile applications that meet the needs of our users and clients.
  • Your role will involve coding, debugging, and optimizing Android apps while staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends and best practices.
Key Responsibilities:
  • Design and develop native Android applications from scratch or enhance existing ones to deliver outstanding user experiences.
  • Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code, and troubleshoot and resolve bugs to ensure the apps stability and reliability.
  • Work closely with UX/UI designers to implement visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces that align with design guidelines.
  • Integrate with web services, APIs, and third-party libraries to fetch and send data securely.
  • Optimize the apps performance, responsiveness, and resource utilization to ensure smooth user interactions and minimal battery consumption.
  • Use version control systems (e.g., Git) to manage code changes and collaborate effectively with team members.
  • Write unit tests, conduct manual testing, and collaborate with quality assurance teams to ensure the application functions correctly across various devices and Android versions.
  • Implement security best practices, including data encryption, authentication, and authorization, to protect user data and maintain compliance with privacy regulations.
  • Maintain clear and up-to-date documentation for code, APIs, and project-related information to facilitate knowledge sharing and future development.
  • Stay updated with the latest Android development trends, tools, and technologies, and share your knowledge with the team.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers, designers, backend developers, and quality assurance engineers, to deliver high-quality products on time.
Qualifications:
  • Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
  • Proven experience as an Android Developer with a portfolio of completed Android apps.
  • Strong knowledge of Java or Kotlin programming languages.
  • Proficiency in Android Studio and related development tools.
  • Familiarity with RESTful APIs, JSON, and web services integration.
  • Experience with version control systems, particularly Git.
  • Understanding of design principles, UI/UX guidelines, and Material Design.
  • Knowledge of mobile app architecture patterns (e.g., MVVM, MVP).
  • Strong problem-solving and debugging skills.
  • Ability to work independently and in a team, as well as excellent communication skills.
  • A passion for staying updated with the latest trends in mobile app development.
    • Preferred Qualifications:
  • Experience with cross-platform development frameworks (e.g., Flutter, React Native).
  • Knowledge of Android Jetpack components and libraries.
  • Familiarity with cloud services (e.g., Firebase, AWS) for app development.
  • Understanding of mobile security best practices.
  • Contributions to open-source Android projects or active participation in the Android developer community.
  • Benefit from invaluable mentorship provided by seasoned leaders.
  • Enjoy a vibrant atmosphere enriched with engaging games and activities.
  • Receive quarterly rewards as a token of recognition for your valuable contributions.
  • Immerse yourself in a creative and open culture that fosters innovation.
  • Full-time / Freelance / Part-time / Contract
  • A minimum duration of 6 months is mandatory.
  • In case of no prior experience, you have the option to apply for an internship.
